title: Failed to build glib due to iconv error
body:
I failed to build glib on CentOS 7 due to error in configure: "GNU libiconv not in use but included iconv.h is from libiconv". GCC 4.8.5 shipped with CentOS is used.

### Expected Result

Spack installs glib.

### Actual Result

Spack failed to install glib due to iconv error.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install glib@2.55.1 %gcc@4.8.5
...
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j4'

6 errors found in build log:
     [ ... ]
     597     CC       libglib_2_0_la-gcharset.lo
     598     CC       libglib_2_0_la-gchecksum.lo
     599     CC       libglib_2_0_la-gconvert.lo
     600     CC       libglib_2_0_la-gdataset.lo
     601     CC       libglib_2_0_la-gdate.lo
     602     CC       libglib_2_0_la-gdatetime.lo
  >> 603   gconvert.c:59:2: error: #error GNU libiconv not in use but included iconv.h is from libiconv
     604    #error GNU libiconv not in use but included iconv.h is from libiconv
     605     ^
  >> 606   make[4]: *** [libglib_2_0_la-gconvert.lo] Error 1
     607   make[4]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     608   make[4]: Leaving directory `/lustre/home/acct-medhjy/public/spack/var/spack/stage/glib-2.55.1-wwkm635eqb5rmou57pu3n6ype2fcrj3e/glib-2.55.1/glib'
  >> 609   make[3]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     610   make[3]: Leaving directory `/lustre/home/acct-medhjy/public/spack/var/spack/stage/glib-2.55.1-wwkm635eqb5rmou57pu3n6ype2fcrj3e/glib-2.55.1/glib'
  >> 611   make[2]: *** [all] Error 2
     612   make[2]: Leaving directory `/lustre/home/acct-medhjy/public/spack/var/spack/stage/glib-2.55.1-wwkm635eqb5rmou57pu3n6ype2fcrj3e/glib-2.55.1/glib'
  >> 613   make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     614   make[1]: Leaving directory `/lustre/home/acct-medhjy/public/spack/var/spack/stage/glib-2.55.1-wwkm635eqb5rmou57pu3n6ype2fcrj3e/glib-2.55.1'
  >> 615   make: *** [all] Error 2
```

### Information on your system

GCC 4.8.5 shipped with CentOS 7.3 is used. No relevant configuration on glib is made. Detailed logs are attached.
